title-group.article-title: Ceracote 484 - A New Aluminum Ceramic Coating with low Cr⁶⁺ Content for Corrosion Control of Compressor Components

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1993 Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc.

abstract.p: Aluminum-ceramic coatings are well known in aircraft industry as corrosion protective coatings. Especially compressor parts of low alloyed steels or stainless steels - which are in use up to 600°C are protected by these kind of coatings. All the available coatings have a lot of chromic acid, causing health problems during application which is done by normal spraying technique. A new aluminum ceramic coating with low Cr⁶⁺ content has been developed. Properties are presented also in comparison to established systems. The corrosion protection is comparable or better, erosion resistance even superior.

ref.mixed-citation: Simon H., Thoma M., Angewandte Ober- flächentechnik für metallische Werk- stoffe, Carl Hanser Verlag, 1985
Thoma M., Mechanisch aufgebrachte Plattierschichten und hochtemperatur- betändige Lacke als Alternative zu galvanisch aufgebrachten Schichten, Metalloberfläche, 33 (1979) 2, pages 45-50
Simon H., Anorganisch gebundene Lacke als Korrosionsschutz, Metallober- fläche, 39 (1985) 9, pages 321-324
